title: Cant use xin dragon slayer chroma
body: hey guys got my first chroma skin for xin dragonslayer but it doesnt even have an option to choose?

replies.body:
If you're trying to select a chroma for a champion, keep in mind that each chroma does not show up as it's own separate skin. 

To pick a chroma, you should see little colored boxes on the skin that has chromas unlocked. Click on the skin, then click on the box of the chroma you want, and you should be set!

Cool yeah i tired that also the boxes dont appear at all :S
and i just checked my riot story history to make sure it processed which it has 
possible bug?
thanks
Edit, using old client just tried again in custom game and also no boxes appeared in champ select
also tried on new client and i could pick it so only old client seems to have the problem, thanks ill just use new one for the moment. even though the lag xD

It could be possible that some of your game file assets for chromas went a little screwy for one reason or another. Try running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and let it do the repair to be sure that all your game files are intact. 

If that doesn't work, feel free to shoot me a screenshot of your champion select in a custom game so I can see exactly what's happening on your end!
